title: Special Summoner Icon for Alpha Testers
body: It'd be cool if we actually get a reward for participating in the development of the alpha client, a simple summoner icon would be enough but yeah still something cool I guess.

replies.body:
You will get a summoner icon if you've logged in to the Alpha client before November 15th. The icon should be in your account by November 29th.

From [DevBlog](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8):
>Finally, as a small thank you for the hard work of alpha testers, we’ve created an exclusive summoner icon for anyone who participated in the alpha. Their feedback and participation really helped us make the client better. If you’ve logged in to the alpha before November 15th, you'll get it!

From [Updated Client Open Beta FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h3q4):
>**I PARTICIPATED IN THE ALPHA--DO I GET ANYTHING?**
YES! Alpha testers will be receiving an exclusive summoner icon. The icon should be in your account by November 29th.

>https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215686407/Alpha-Icon.jpg

{{champion:17}}
